entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has been to Hogwarts and felt at home there. (Excerpt: 'this school than he has ever been to a person... where he had been happiest; the first and only place he had felt at home.')

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A magical school that Harry has attended and felt happy about. (Excerpt: 'Hogwarts was where he had been happiest; the first and only place he had felt at home.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who has penetrated many secrets of Hogwarts. (Excerpt: 'Undoubtedly Voldemort had penetrated many more of its secrets than most of the students who pass through the place...')

entities.name: professor slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts with whom Voldemort was on good terms. (Excerpt: 'who had demonstrated how influential a role a teacher can play')
